snippet: Mr. Priebke, who was under house arrest in Rome, helped organize the execution of 335 men and boys at the Ardeatine Caves in 1944.
abstract: Erich Priebke, former SS captain who was sentenced to life in prison for helping to organize execution of 335 men and boys at the Ardeatine Caves in Italy in 1944, dies at age 100.

byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Priebke, who was under house arrest in Rome, helped organize the execution of 335 men and boys at the Ardeatine Caves in 1944.

headline.main: Erich Priebke, Nazi Who Carried Out Massacre of 335 Italians, Dies at 100
headline.print_headline: Erich Priebke, Nazi Who Carried Out Massacre of 335 Italians, Dies at 100

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
